segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, drying a plate with absolute focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflows, cascading onto the floor, but she seems completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a sense of unease watching her work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What would happen if she slipped in that puddle?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sun shines through the window, illuminating the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, are up to something sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy precariously balanced on that stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, but I can’t shake the feeling of danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly waiting, arm extended, eyes full of excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s just cookies, but their disobedience worries me for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, such a stark contrast to the scene inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would notice the water pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who would have thought a simple kitchen could hold such tension?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning, to make them all aware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what would happen if everything went wrong in that moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
